html: All joy is darkened "All gladness is passed away"—For ערבה arebah, darkened, read עברה aberah, passed away, transposing a letter. Houbigant, Secker. Five of Dr. Kennicott's and five of De Rossi's MSS., several ancients add כל col, all, after משוש mesos : the Septuagint adds the same word before it.
